00020 #ifndef H_POSIXCON_STACK
00021 #define H_POSIXCON_STACK
00022 
00023 #include <vector>
00024 #include <string>
00025 #include <rdkcore/textutils/textutils.h>
00026 #include <sstream>
00027 
00028 namespace PosixConstructs {
00029 
00030     using std::string;
00031     using RDK2::TextUtils::cstr;
00032     using std::ostringstream;
00033 
00034 struct Context {
00035     string file, function; int line; string why;
00036 
00037     Context(cstr file, cstr function, int line, cstr why):
00038         file(file), function(function), line(line), why(why) { }
00039 
00040     string toString();
00041 };
00042 
00043 struct Stack {
00044     std::vector<Context> stack;
00045 
00046     Stack(cstr file, cstr function, int line, cstr why) {
00047         stack.push_back(Context(file,function,line,why));
00048     }
00049     Stack() { }
00050 
00051     Stack(std::vector<Context> stack): stack(stack) {}
00052 
00053     string toString();
00054 };
00055 
00056 Stack operator+(const Stack&a, const Stack&b);
00057 
00058 #define WHERE(why) PosixConstructs::Stack(__FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, why)
00059 #define HERE PosixConstructs::Stack(__FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "(?)")
00060 
00061 } // namespace
00062 
00063 #endif
